author: frangio_
content:
i wrote down my arguments for EOF and the selection criteria i think makes most sense. i make a specific proposal but it's very close to C) Baseline EOF so it can be seen as in favor of that

https://hackmd.io/@frangio/additive-eof

author: sanleo
content:
Is it a good idea to maybe keep EIP-5920 PAY opcode in the case of Baseline EOF?
You marked it as excluded, but it seems like a nice way to clean up / standardize old behaviour, though its not strictly necessary so might be more trouble than its worth.
